parameters.name: Subscriptions
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id, selected = iff(id =~ todynamic('{DefaultSubscription_Internal}').ws, true, false), custId= properties.customerId

parameters.name: Servers
parameters.query:
SecurityEvent
| distinct SourceComputerId, Computer
| project Computer
| order by Computer desc

content.json:
>**Author(s):**
>- [Antonio Canitano](mailto:antonio.canitano@microsoft.com)
>- [Bruno Gabrielli](mailto:bruno.gabrielli@microsoft.com)
>- [Antonio Di Lorenzo](mailto:antonio.dilorenzo@microsoft.com)
>
>**Version 1.6**
>2021-02-17
>- Added SQL Audit group with tiles
>- Added tiles about:
>	- List of common failing usernames
>	- Failed users that logged on succesfully
>	- Count of logon failures by Source IpAddress
>	- Failing user details for the selected IpAddress
>
>**Version 1.5**
>2021-02-05
>- Modified by Bruno Gabrielli to add File Audit tiles, more parameters, more detailed info about group type, group scope, distribution group group management operators
>
>**Version 1.4**
>2020-12-15
>- Modified by Antonio Canitano to add queries and charts grouped by type.
>
>**Version 1.3**
>2020-09-29
>- Modified by Antonio Di Lorenzo to add the ability to pin and open query in Log Query to all views. Added "remove this" note to this versions history.
>
>**Version 1.2**
>2020-02-14
>- Modified by Antonio Canitano to add a list of queries at the end of the wb
of the workbook.
>

>**Version 1.2**
>2020-05-13
>- Modified by Bruno Gabrielli to fix an issue with the log cleared tile.
>
>**Version 1.1**
>2020-02-06
>- Modified by Bruno Gabrielli to fix all the missing Workspace parameters that were preventing the queries from running.
>
>**Version 1.0**
>2020-30-01
>- Initial version created by Antonio Canitano.

# Get Started 

Welcome to the Security & Privacy workbook. This workbook is designed to to ease the reporting of account and group management as well as the activities about both failed and successful logons. It also provides you with the visibility of which computers and users have been attacked the most.

## Requirements:

- Collection of Security events through either [Azure Security Center](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/security-center-partner-integration#manage-integrated-azure-security-solutions-and-other-data-sources) or [Azure Sentinel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/connect-windows-security-events) connector.
- Audit Policies configured according to the security requirements for your company with at least the following categories and subcategories enabled for **Failure** and **Success**:
	
>| Category | Subcategory | Event(s) generated |
>| -------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
>| Account Management | Security Group Management | 4728, 4729, 4732, 4733 |
>| Account Management | User Account Management | 4720, 4723, 4724, 4726, 4738 |
>| Logon/Logoff | Logon | 4624, 4625 |

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4720
| summarize AggregatedValue = count(EventID) by bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: Account Created - Daily aggregation
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4720
| project TimeGenerated, Account, SamAccountName, DisplayName
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Account Created - Details
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4724
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by TargetAccount
| sort by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Password Change
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4724
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by TargetAccount
| sort by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Password Change - Search
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4740
| summarize count(EventID) by Account
| top 10 by count_EventID desc 
| render barchart
content.title: Top 10 Account Locked
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4740
| summarize count(EventID) by Account
| top 10 by count_EventID desc
//| project Computer, EventID, Activity, Account, TimeGenerated, IpAddress
content.title: Top 10 Account Locked - Search
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4740
| summarize count(EventID) by IpAddress
| order by count_EventID desc 
| top 10 by count_EventID 
| render barchart 
//| project Computer, EventID, Activity, Account, TimeGenerated, IpAddress
content.title: Top 10 Computer with Account Locked
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4740
| summarize count(EventID) by IpAddress
| order by count_EventID desc 
| top 10 by count_EventID
//| project Computer, EventID, Activity, Account, TimeGenerated, IpAddress
content.title: Top 10 Computer with Account Locked - Search
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4738 
| where Account !endswith "$" 
| parse EventData with * '"UserAccountControl">' UserAccountControl '<' * 
| parse EventData with * '"TargetUserName">' SubjectDomainName '<' * 
| parse EventData with * '"TargetDomainName">' SubjectUserName '<' * 
| where UserAccountControl contains "%%2089" or UserAccountControl contains "%%2057" 
| extend UserAccountControlDesc = iif(UserAccountControl contains "%%2089", "Granted", "Removed")
| summarize dcount(TargetUserName) by UserAccountControlDesc
content.title: 'Password never expire' attribute changes
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4738
| where Account !endswith "$"
| parse EventData with * '"UserAccountControl">' UserAccountControl '<' *
| parse EventData with * '"TargetUserName">' SubjectDomainName '<' *
| parse EventData with * '"TargetDomainName">' SubjectUserName '<' *
| where UserAccountControl contains "%%2089" or UserAccountControl contains "%%2057"
| project TimeGenerated, TargetAccount=strcat(TargetDomainName,"\\",TargetUserName), PasswordNeverExpire=iif(UserAccountControl contains "%%2089", "Granted", "Removed"), ["By"] = Account
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: 'Password never expire' attribute changes
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4624, 4625)
| where AccountType has "user"
| where not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize OK = count() by Activity
| sort by OK desc
| render piechart
content.title: Count of logon events by status
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

seriesLabelSettings.seriesName: 4625 - An account failed to log on.
4624 - An account was successfully logged on.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4624, 4625)
| where AccountType =~ "User" and not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize SuccessfulLogons = countif(EventID==4624) , FailedLogons=countif(EventID==4625) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
content.title: Count of logons (Successful & Failed) by 30m
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4624, 4625)
| where AccountType has "User"
| where not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize SuccessfulLogons = countif(EventID==4624) , FailedLogons=countif(EventID==4625) by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| render timechart
content.title: Count of logon events by status - Trend
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType has "user"
| where not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Account
| top 20 by AggregatedValue desc
| render barchart
content.title: Top 20 Failed Logons
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType has "user"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Account
| sort by AggregatedValue desc
| top 20 by AggregatedValue
content.title: Failed Logon - Search
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType == "User" 
| distinct Account
| sort by Account asc nulls first
content.title: List of common failing user names

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
//| where Account !endswith "$"
| where AccountType == "User" 
| summarize numOfAttack = count(EventID) by IpAddress
| project IpAddress, numOfAttack, hint="(ðŸ’¡ Select the IpAddress for more details below.)"
| sort by numOfAttack desc nulls last
content.title: Count of logon failures by Source IpAddress.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType == "User" 
| where IpAddress == ("{IpAddress}")
| summarize failureCount=count(EventID) by Account
| project Account, failureCount
content.title: Failing user details for the IpAddress: {IpAddress}

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType has "User"
| where not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize FailedLogons = count(EventID) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
content.title: Failed Logons Trend
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType =~ "User"
| where not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize FailedLogons = count(EventID) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| render timechart
content.title: Failed logon by computer(s)
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType =~ "User"
| where not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize FailedLogons = count(EventID) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
content.title: Failed logon by computer(s) - Search
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4624
| where AccountType =~ "User" and not(Account contains_cs "DWM" or Account startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Account
| sort by AggregatedValue desc
| render barchart
content.title: Count of successful logon by user
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4624
| where AccountType has "User"
| where (Account !contains_cs "DWM" and Account !startswith_cs "NT")
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Account
| sort by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Count of successful logon by user - Search
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4740
| project Account,IpAddress, Computer, TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Locked Accounts
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
let attackedUserList = SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType == "User" 
| summarize lastFailure = arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Account
| project lastFailure, Account;
let attackedUserListSuccess = SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624
| where AccountType == "User"
| project success=TimeGenerated, Account;
attackedUserListSuccess
| join kind=leftouter (attackedUserList) on $left.Account == $right.Account
| where success > lastFailure
| summarize arg_min(success, *) by lastFailure
| project Account, lastFailure, success
content.title: Failed users that logged on succesfully

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4771
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer
| order by AggregatedValue
content.title: Kerberos pre-authentications failed
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4771
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer
| order by AggregatedValue

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4728, 4729, 4732, 4733)
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Activity
| top 5 by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Group Membership Changes - Aggregated
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4728, 4729, 4732, 4733, 4756, 4757, 4751, 4752, 4761, 4762)
| where SubjectAccount !contains "$"
| extend accountName = split(split(MemberName,",")[0],"=")[1]
| extend groupType = iif(Activity contains "security-enabled","Security","Distribution")
| extend groupScope = iif(EventID in (4732, 4733, 4746, 4747), "Local", iif(EventID in (4728, 4729, 4751, 4752), "Global",iif(EventID in (4756, 4757, 4761, 4762), "Universal", "Unknown")))
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, accountName, TargetAccount, groupType, groupScope, SubjectAccount
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Group Membership Changes - Details
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4728, 4729, 4732, 4733)
| where AccountType =~ "user"
| summarize OK = count() by Activity
| sort by OK desc
| render piechart
content.title: Admin Group changes - Aggregated
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4728, 4729, 4732, 4733, 4756, 4757, 4751, 4752, 4761, 4762)
| extend groupType = iif(Activity contains "security-enabled","Security","Distribution")
| extend groupScope = iif(EventID in (4732, 4733, 4746, 4747), "Local", iif(EventID in (4728, 4729, 4751, 4752), "Global",iif(EventID in (4756, 4757, 4761, 4762), "Universal", "Unknown")))
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by TargetAccount, groupType, groupScope
| order by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Admin Group changes - count by group
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventSourceName == "Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog"
| where EventID == 1102
| summarize count() by Computer
content.title: Count of Times Audit Log was Cleared
content.noDataMessage: No changes during the select time frame

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventSourceName == "Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog"
| where EventID == 1102
| parse kind=relaxed EventData with * "<SubjectUserName>" userName "</SubjectUserName>" *
| parse kind=relaxed EventData with * "<SubjectDomainName>" usrDomain "</SubjectDomainName>" *
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, OperatedBy = strcat(usrDomain,"\\",userName), Activity
content.title: Audit Log Clean Up - Details

content.json:
# Get Started 

Welcome to the Security & Privacy workbook. This workbook is designed to to ease the reporting of account and activity management as well as the activities about both failed and successful logons on your SQL Server instances. 

## Requirements:

- Collection of Security events through either [Azure Security Center](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/security-center-partner-integration#manage-integrated-azure-security-solutions-and-other-data-sources) or [Azure Sentinel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/connect-windows-security-events) connector.
- [SQL Server Audit](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/relational-databases/security/auditing/sql-server-audit-database-engine?view=sql-server-ver15) configured according to the security requirements for your company.
- [Genereate Security Audits](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/security-policy-settings/generate-security-audits) right granted to the service account configured for SQL Server.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where SqlStatement has "CREATE LOGIN"
| parse kind=relaxed SqlStatement with * "LOGIN [" loginName "]" *
| parse kind=relaxed SqlStatement with * "] FROM " loginType " WITH " *
| extend loginType = iif(isempty(loginType), "SQL", loginType)
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, SqlStatement, DatabaseName, loginName, loginType, UserName, SqlServer_Or_Instance
content.title: New logins

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where SqlStatement has "DROP LOGIN"
| parse kind=relaxed SqlStatement with * "LOGIN [" loginName "]" *
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, SqlStatement, DatabaseName, loginName, UserName, SqlServer_Or_Instance
content.title: Dropped logins

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where SqlStatement contains "login failed"
| project ["Time Generated"]=TimeGenerated, ["Time Collected"]=TimeCollected, ["SQL Event Time [UTC only]"]=OriginalEventTime, ["User Name"]=UserName, ["On SqlServer / Instance"]=SqlServer_Or_Instance, ["From computer"]=Computer, ["Event Source"]=EventSourceName, ["Event Log Name"]=Channel, EventID, ["Audit Description"]=iff(Level==16, "Failure Audit", "Success Audit"), ["Event Level"]=Level, ["Sql Statement"]=SqlStatement
| sort by ["Time Generated"] desc
content.title: Failed Logins

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where SqlStatement contains "login failed"
| summarize accesscount = count(SqlStatement) by SqlServer_Or_Instance
content.title: Failed logins by SQL Server or Instance

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where SqlStatement contains "login successful"
| summarize accesscount = count(SqlStatement) by SqlServer_Or_Instance
content.title: Successful logins by SQL Server or Instance

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where UserName !contains "$"
| where isnotempty(DatabaseName) and isnotnull(DatabaseName)
| summarize activityCount = count() by DatabaseName
| top 10 by activityCount
content.title: Activities by database

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where UserName !contains "$"
| where isnotempty(DatabaseName) and isnotnull(DatabaseName)
| summarize activityCount = count() by DatabaseName, bin(TimeGenerated,10m)
| top 10 by activityCount
content.title: Activities by database (trend)

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where SqlStatement has "CREATE DATABASE"
| parse kind=relaxed SqlStatement with * "CREATE DATABASE [" DatabaseName "] " *
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData, OriginalEventTime, ActionSucceeded, SessionId, TransactionID, SessionEstablishedBy, UserName, SqlServer_Or_Instance, DatabaseName, SchemaName, SqlStatement
content.title: New databases

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 33205
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "event_time:" OriginalEventTime " sequence_number:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "succeeded:" ActionSucceeded " is_column:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_id:" SessionId " server_principal_id:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "transaction_id:" TransactionID " class_type:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "session_server_principal_name:" SessionEstablishedBy " server_principal_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " server_principal_name:" UserName " server_principal_sid:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "server_instance_name:" SqlServer_Or_Instance " database_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "database_name:" DatabaseName " schema_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "schema_name:" SchemaName " object_name:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * "object_name:" Object " statement:"
| parse kind=regex EventData with * " statement:" SqlStatement " additional_information:"
| where SqlStatement has "DROP DATABASE"
| project TimeGenerated, TimeCollected, Computer, EventSourceName, Channel, Level, EventID, EventData, OriginalEventTime, ActionSucceeded, SessionId, TransactionID, SessionEstablishedBy, UserName, SqlServer_Or_Instance, DatabaseName, SchemaName, SqlStatement
content.title: Drop databases

parameters.name: EventIDParam
parameters.label: Event ID
parameters.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in (4656, 4658, 4660, 4663, 4664, 4670, 4985, 5051)
| distinct EventID
| order by EventID asc

content.query:
SecurityEvent 
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in ({EventIDParam})
| where AccountType == "User"
//| where Account matches regex @"(?i){UserParam}"
| summarize ["Event Count"] = count() by Computer
| order by ["Event Count"] desc
content.title: Event Count by Computer

content.query:
SecurityEvent 
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where AccountType == "User"
| where EventID in ({EventIDParam})
//| where Account matches regex @"(?i){UserParam}"
| summarize ["Event Count"] = count() by Account
| order by ["Event Count"] desc
content.title: Event Count by Username

content.query:
SecurityEvent 
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where AccountType == "User"
| where EventID in ({EventIDParam})
//| where Account matches regex @"(?i){UserParam}"
| summarize ["Event Count"] = count() by Activity
| order by ["Event Count"] desc
content.title: Event Count by Event ID

content.query:
SecurityEvent 
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID in ({EventIDParam})
| where AccountType == "User"
| where Account matches regex @"(?i){UserParam}"
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, Computer, Account, AccountType, EventID, EventData, AccessList, AccessMask, AccessReason, AccountDomain, AccountExpires, AccountName
content.title: All File System Management Events.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4663
| where AccountType == "User"
| where ObjectType == "File"
| where AccessMask == "0x2" 
| summarize count() by ObjectName
content.title: File(s) created.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4663
| where AccountType == "User"
| where ObjectType == "File"
| where AccessMask == "0x2"
| summarize count() by SubjectUserName
content.title: Count of files created by User.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4663
| where AccountType == "User"
| where ObjectType == "File" 
| where AccessMask == "0x10000" 
| summarize count() by ObjectName
content.title: File(s) deleted.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Computer in ({Servers})
| where EventID == 4663
| where AccountType == "User"
| where ObjectType == "File"
| where AccessMask == "0x10000"
| summarize count() by SubjectUserName
content.title: Count of file(s) deleted by user.

content.json:
### Logon Activity by Account

SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4624, 4625)
| where AccountType =~ "User"
| summarize LogonCount = count() by Account

### Logoff Activity by Account

SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4634
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Account

### Change Password Attempts

SecurityEvent 
| where EventID in (4723, 4724 )
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by TargetAccount

### Reset Password Attemps by Non-Owners

SecurityEvent 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where EventID == 4724 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, TargetAccount, SubjectAccount

### User Account Created

SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4720
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, AccountType, SubjectAccount, TargetAccount, DisplayName

### User Account Deleted

SecurityEvent | where EventID == 4726 | sort by TimeGenerated desc | project TimeGenerated, AccountType, SubjectAccount, TargetAccount, DisplayName

### Domain and Built-in Administrators Membership Added
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID in (4728, 4732)
| where (TargetSid endswith_cs \"-512\" or TargetSid == \"S-1-5-32-544\") 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| project TimeGenerated, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TargetAccount

### Domain and Built-in Administrators Membership Removed

SecurityEvent 
| where EventID in (4729, 4733)
| where (TargetSid endswith_cs \"-512\" or TargetSid == \"S-1-5-32-544\")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| project TimeGenerated, SubjectAccount, MemberName, TargetAccount

### Group Membership Changes

SecurityEvent 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d) | where EventID in (4728, 4729, 4732, 4733)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, SubjectAccount, TargetUserName, MemberName, MemberSid

### Group Membership Added

SecurityEvent 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d) 
| where EventID in (4728, 4732)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, SubjectAccount, TargetUserName, MemberName, MemberSid

### Group Membership Removed

SecurityEvent 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d) 
| where EventID in (4729, 4733)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, SubjectAccount, TargetUserName, MemberName, MemberSid

### Audit Log was Cleared
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID == 1102 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
